Comment 4: 
> yes, but it shows that is very easy to displease the race detector assumptions about

Race detector is displeased when there are bugs in the program. So, yes, it's very easy
to displease it by introducing a bug. But this is WorkingAsIntended.

> not sure it makes sense to delegate to make the race detector happy to all
users/usages of httptest

Race detector goal is to detect bugs. I do not see any point in making race detector
happy about buggy programs.

If you have any evidence that this is a false positive, then please reopen the bug.
Marking it as WorkingAsIntended for now.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
